text: Sabai allahako samu pratyaksarupale ubhine chan tyasa bela durbala mancheharu savala manchesamga bhanne chanh ki hami ta timra adhinastha thiyaum. Ta ke timi allahako sajayamadhyebata kehi sajaya ghata'una sakchau’’? Uni uttara dinechan ‘‘ki yadi allahale hamila'i margadarsana gareko bha'e hami pani timro avasya netrtva gathryaum’’. Aba ta hamimathi becaini ra santosa garnu duvai e'utai cha, ra hamro lagi kunai mukti chaina
